simulated_ratings.title: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy (2011)

simulated_ratings.feeling: Grimy pursuit with real teeth and zero polish.

simulated_ratings.title: Gone Baby Gone (2007)

simulated_ratings.title: The Thing (1982)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Paranoia and gore with cold precision.

simulated_ratings.title: The Fly (1986)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Body horror with tragic clarity—Cronenberg at his sweetest spot.

simulated_ratings.title: Starship Troopers (1997)

simulated_ratings.title: Se7en (1995)

simulated_ratings.title: Burn After Reading (2008)

simulated_ratings.title: In the Loop (2009)
